question: I have another question.  Has anyone here come down with Hep C induced Diabetes?  Also, Cryoglobulmenia (sp)?  I was born with ITP, some get it from treatment.  Lately I was daignosed with Parkinsons Disease, has anyone had that diagnoses?  I am a 1a genotype. and sorry about the double post on ? my hands have a mind of their own :-)).  Another thing I have seen a lot of is a large free floating gall stone.  Any have that?
title: Auto Immune Diseases
